column3:
You can choose from different text-scrolling
speeds to control how quickly messages appear.

You can choose whether you wish to see move
animations during battles or not.

You can choose if you want to switch Pokémon
after an opponent faints or not.

You can change the way that Japanese text
is displayed.

You can choose to have Pokémon automatically
sent to your Boxes or not when your party is full.
Would like to save these settings?

You can choose whether you wish to tilt your
Joy-Con for controls in certain locations.

You can choose to have your game saved
automatically or not.
You can adjust the volume of background music.
You can adjust the volume of sound effects.
You can adjust the volume of Pokémon cries.

Would you like to reset the settings to
their defaults?
Would you like to save these settings?

You can choose regular or inverted for vertical
camera controls.

You can choose regular or inverted for horizontal
camera controls.

You can select if you want to show your
Pokémon’s nickname during Link Battles.

You can choose whether you wish to give a
nickname to a Pokémon when you obtain it.
The attempt has failed. Please try again.
You can change your window type.

You can select whether or not you’d like the
screen to shake while you’re digging for Fossils.
